Posts.Content:
Thanks so much Mary - Debbie is 54 and in Seattle right now undergoing her chemo - we live in Alaska. She is flexible regarding help in other areas of the US and has just asked for assistance from me. Yes - it's actually in her upper arm/shoulder area. I appreciate you getting back to me and hope to get some information - this is a great way to find support!
Sandy
Posts.Title: Brachial Plexus Metastasized Tumor

Posts.Content:
Hi Laure' - thanks so much for the info this morning! I will print it off as I am traveling to Seattle today to spend some time with them. It's great to get names for info so this has been a great help! It's a place to start as I do feel helpless sometimes darn it. I appreciate your sharing and wish you and your hubby good health! Take care and God Bless!
Sandy
Posts.Title: Brachial Plexus Metastasized Tumor

Posts.Content: My sister is being treated (third time) for breast cancer Stage IV now and having a rough go at this time. The doctors say it's a metastasized tumor in the brachial plexus with peripheral (sp) nerve damage. Looking for information on a Neurosurgeon that might specialize in this area. Any information or any type of help is appreciated. Thank you.
Posts.Title: Brachial Plexus Metastasized Tumor
